status: 'Til You Fall in Love ; Let's Be together ; Nim odnalazła nas miłość (Polish) ; Someday Fall in Love ; Itsuka Koi ni Naru Made ; Someday I'll Fall For You ; Someday I’ll Fall for You ; Until Someday When We Fall in Love ; ¡Enamorémonos! ; จนกว่าเราจะตกหลุมรัก ; いつか恋になるまで ; 总有一天坠入爱河 ; 直到兩情相悅 ; 直到恋爱的那一天 ; 直到绽放爱情 ; 直到與君相戀 ; 언젠가 사랑이 될 때까지
description:
Description :
        Childhood friends Chiaki and Kazuma have been brought up like brothers, but the illusion of family shatters when Kazuma catches Chiaki touching himself, and in the heat of the moment, ends up lending a hand. From that night on, the two of them help each other satisfy their base urgesthat is, until Kazuma gets a girlfriend and Chiaki realizes his feelings go beyond friends with benefits. Will these childhood friends be able to go back to the way they were before? Or will their relationship manage to bloom into something more?
